name: The Innovator's Quest

rounds.name: Logic & Mental Ability
rounds.description: Test your logical reasoning and problem-solving skills

rounds.name: Creative Build Challenge
rounds.description: Build innovative solutions using provided materials

rules: Each team must have exactly 4 members from different branches
Late entries will not be accepted
All team members must be present during registration
Use of mobile phones is strictly prohibited during rounds
description: The ultimate interdisciplinary collaboration challenge that tests technical skills, creativity, and teamwork.
